Key Match Events: Mookie Betts hit a solo home run in the first inning
Shohei Ohtani drove a ball down the right-field line
Will Smith blasted another weak pitch over the center-field fence
Post-Match Reflections: The Dodgers created drama with a desperation 8-0 victory at Petco Park
The fifth and final game in this brawl will take place Friday night at Chavez Ravine
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the largest shutout win in Dodgers playoff history
The winner of this game likely will be the favorite to not only advance to the World Series but also win it
Others: The series opener featured a monster first punch by the home-run-hitting Ohtani
The second game was filled with showboating Padres who taunted bottle-throwing fans
